TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed BaseCompatibilityPreferences extends System.Object
public ref class BaseCompatibilityPreferences abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含指定應用程式相對於 WindowsBase 組件中新的 WPF 功能應如何表現的屬性。

span.span: Contains properties that specify how an application should behave relative to new WPF features that are in the WindowsBase assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool FlowDispatcherSynchronizationContextPriority { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出有關 的資訊是否儲存至 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether information about the is saved to the .

value.span: 如果將 的相關資訊儲存至 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if information about the is saved to the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值取決於 WPF 的版本，您的應用程式的目標。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果您的應用程式為目標的 WPF 4.0 或更早版本，預設值是`false`。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`. 如果您的應用程式的目標 WPF 4.5，預設值是`true`。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`. 如果您使用這個屬性來變更 WPF 的行為，您必須在應用程式的存留期內，例如應用程式會繼承的類別建構函式中的早期變更屬性的值。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property’s value early in the app’s lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在讀取值之後，您無法再次變更。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailure { System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions get(); void set(System::Windows::BaseCompatibilityPreferences::HandleDispatcherRequestProcessingFailureOptions value); };

summary.span: 定義發送器如何回應在處理要求時發生的失敗。

span.span: Defines how the dispatcher reacts to failures encountered when it requests processing.

value.span: 定義發送器如何回應失敗的值。

span.span: A value that defines how the dispatcher reacts to failures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 發送器的回應要求處理，藉由設定計時器或張貼訊息至其本身時所遇到的失敗。The Windows Presentation Foundation dispatcher reacts to failures that it encounters when requesting processing by setting a timer or posting messages to itself. 如果這些作業失敗，因為基礎的作業系統資源已用完，發送器會變成沒有回應。If these operations fail because the underlying operating system resource is exhausted, the dispatcher becomes unresponsive. 一般而言，此失敗會造成速度快過發送器可以處理這類公佈訊息應用程式或匱乏資源發送器的訊息幫浦。Typically, this failure is caused by an application posting messages faster than the dispatcher can handle them or by starving the dispatcher's message pump. 為協助診斷發送器的一堆的原因，您可以控制如何發送器回應這些失敗藉由設定這個屬性。To aid in diagnosing the cause of the dispatcher's unresponsiveness, you can control how the dispatcher responds to these failures by setting this property. 這個屬性值可以隨時變更。This property value can be changed at any time. 如果從多個執行緒進行變更，這個值是設定的最後一個寫入器 （「 上次寫入者獲勝 」 行為）。If it is changed from multiple threads, the value is that set by the last writer ("last writer wins" behavior).

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool InlineDispatcherSynchronizationContextSend { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 方法會將委派放在發送程式佇列，還是直接叫用委派。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method puts the delegates on the dispatcher queue or if the delegate is directly invoked.

value.span: 如果 方法會將委派放在發送器佇列或直接叫用委派則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method puts the delegates on the dispatcher queue or if the delegate is directly invoked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值取決於 WPF 的版本，您的應用程式的目標。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果您的應用程式為目標的 WPF 4.0 或更早版本，預設值是`false`。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `false`. 如果您的應用程式的目標 WPF 4.5，預設值是`true`。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `true`. 如果您使用這個屬性來變更 WPF 的行為，您必須在應用程式的存留期內，例如應用程式會繼承的類別建構函式中的早期變更屬性的值。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property’s value early in the app’s lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在讀取值之後，您無法再次變更。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static property bool ReuseDispatcherSynchronizationContextInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否在多個發送器作業中使用單一 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a single is used for multiple dispatcher operations.

value.span: 如果多個發送器作業使用單一 則為 true，否則為 。

span.span: true if a single is used for multiple dispatcher operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值取決於 WPF 的版本，您的應用程式的目標。The default value of this property depends which version of WPF that your app targets. 如果您的應用程式為目標的 WPF 4.0 或更早版本，預設值是`true`。If your app targets WPF 4.0 or earlier, the default is `true`. 如果您的應用程式的目標 WPF 4.5，預設值是`false`。If your app targets WPF 4.5, the default is `false`. 如果您使用這個屬性來變更 WPF 的行為，您必須在應用程式的存留期內，例如應用程式會繼承的類別建構函式中的早期變更屬性的值。If you use this property to change the behavior of WPF, you must change the property’s value early in the app’s lifetime, such in the constructor of the class that inherits from Application. 在讀取值之後，您無法再次變更。After the value is read, you cannot change it again.
